code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var productSlice=createSlice({name:'product',initialState:{product:[],filter:{trademark:[],color:[],memory:[],ram:[]}},reducers:{filterProduct:function filterProduct(state,action){state.product=[];console.log('trademark:',state.filter.trademark.length);if(state.filter.trademark.length!==0){var result=action.payload.filter(function(product){return state.filter.trademark.includes(product.trademark);}).slice(0);if(state.product.length===0){state.product=result.slice(0);}else{state.product=result.filter(function(element){var
